column1: Haflong  is a town and headquarters of Dima Hasao district (formerly North Cachar Hills district) in the state of Assam in India. It is the only hill station in Assam.  Haflong is a Dimasa word meaning ant hill.
Haflong has a subtropical highland climate (Köppen climate classification Cwb)
